mining_speed_boost.title: Dwarven Excavation Technique
mining_speed_boost.description: Channel the ancient mining wisdom of the mountain dwarves, increasing mining speed by 10%. Your strikes become more precise, allowing you to tear through stone and ore with supernatural efficiency.

advanced_mining_speed.title: Master Geologist's Precision
advanced_mining_speed.description: Your understanding of rock formations and structural weaknesses reaches masterful levels, increasing mining speed by 20%. Each strike exploits natural fault lines, dramatically accelerating your excavation of even the hardest materials.

block_break_speed.title: Mountain Splitter's Fury
block_break_speed.description: Your strikes resonate with earth-shattering force, granting 5% faster block breaking with all tools. Stone crumbles before your might, and even the hardest materials yield more quickly to your determined efforts.

major_block_break_speed.title: Titanic Harvester
major_block_break_speed.description: Your gathering prowess becomes legendary, increasing block break speed by 15% with all tools. Forests fall before your axe, earth parts for your shovel, and mountains crumble against your pickaxe with unprecedented speed.

collection_range.title: Gravitational Attraction Aura
collection_range.description: Items seem mysteriously drawn to you, extending your pickup range by 1 block. This magnetic aura pulls dropped resources into your possession from greater distances, making collection effortless.

greater_collection_range.title: Resource Magnetism
greater_collection_range.description: A powerful magnetic field surrounds you, extending item pickup range by 3 blocks. Resources fly to your inventory as if eager to be collected, vastly improving gathering efficiency during intensive harvesting.

experience_boost.title: Scholar's Enlightenment
experience_boost.description: Your mind becomes a perfect vessel for knowledge, gaining 5% more experience from all sources. Every lesson learned, enemy defeated, and ore mined yields greater wisdom than before.

gathering_experience.title: Naturalist's Insight
gathering_experience.description: Your analytical mind carefully studies each resource as you harvest it, gaining 10% more experience from gathering activities. Each ore, log, and earthen block reveals its secrets to your discerning eye.

luck_boost.title: Blessing of Lady Fortune
luck_boost.description: The fickle goddess of fortune smiles upon you, granting +2 Luck. Your hands seem to find valuable treasures more often, chests yield better loot, and chance-based events mysteriously shift in your favor.

prospector_luck.title: Master Prospector's Eye
prospector_luck.description: You develop an uncanny sense for valuable materials, gaining +3 Luck when gathering. Rare gems and precious metals reveal themselves more frequently to your expert eye, increasing drop rates of valuable resources.

submerged_mining_speed.title: Abyssal Excavator
submerged_mining_speed.description: You've adapted mining techniques for underwater work, increasing submerged mining speed by 20%. While others struggle against aquatic resistance, your tools slice through water and stone with equal ease.

deep_diver.title: Pressure Adapted Miner
deep_diver.description: Develop specialized underwater mining techniques, increasing submerged mining speed by 40% and adding 60 ticks to your breath meter. Harvest oceanic resources for vastly longer periods without surfacing for air.

bonus_rare_loot_rolls.title: Fortune Seeker's Blessing
bonus_rare_loot_rolls.description: The gods of fortune smile upon you, granting 1 additional roll for rare resources. Your gathering techniques preserve integrity of rare materials, occasionally yielding precious finds others would destroy in extraction.

bonus_loot_count_rolls.title: Abundant Harvester
bonus_loot_count_rolls.description: Your careful gathering techniques occasionally yield additional resources, gaining 1 extra roll for bonus materials. Extract more usable material from the same source through expert handling and refined methods.

entity_interaction_range.title: Extended Reach Mastery
entity_interaction_range.description: Your influence extends beyond normal boundaries, increasing interaction range with entities by 1 block. Manage resources and interact with the world from a greater distance, improving efficiency and safety.

block_interaction_range.title: Master Gatherer's Reach
block_interaction_range.description: Your control over the physical world extends further, increasing block interaction range by 1 block. Harvest resources from greater distances, accessing veins and deposits that would be precarious for others to reach.

mining_efficiency.title: Master Excavator
mining_efficiency.description: Your technique with mining tools approaches perfection, increasing efficiency by 5%. Each strike connects with precision, maximizing the effectiveness of your tools and minimizing wasted energy.
